about_the_game:
This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day
Added a new story
two new game CGs

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day
Added a new story
two new game CGs
name: YUME 2 : Sleepless Night - New Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: This is a platform decryption game. Players need to control the protagonist to find clues in various scenes and experience the protagonist’s day
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
